message.body: Do you want me to bring something for lunch?
I don't think i can come out to say goodbye, it'll be too hard
That's ok. He's still sleeping which is good. Have a safe trip i love you
I love you and im sorry
Do not apologize. You are fine and so is dad
Wasn't caroline from battle boro vermont
Just wondered how they were doing
Im not sure but I think they're safe. She wrote on my Facebook wall about the MTV awards last night so she must be ok
How is tim doing with all this? Don't let these people ruin what you and tim have. They aren't part of your relationship. Set your boundaries
He's fine. Sort of indifferent. The thing is setting those boundaries may be the end of some friendships. But that's what I chose I suppose
Good. Set your boundaries and he they are truly your friends they will allow you to be happy. Did they want tim to wait around for kathe? How was the show last night?
No but they probably didn't wan him to date a friend of katies either. The show was fine. I was a little distracted
